name: Alone Against The Hoard
description: The game starts with the player being in an empty dark room, with just a pistol with the flashlight. Zombies instantiates at four corners of the room, and when they come closer to the player, the player can see them. Audios plays an important role in detecting the direction from which the zombies are coming. The player has to kill the zombies or they will kill him. There are a total of 8 waves of zombies, if the player survives all those waves, he wins.
